name: radnet
description:
*WARNING*: In the Itch web player the autoscroll feature is broken. Just make the game full screen and it should work fine.

radnet is our attempt to try to simulate one irc chat room full of bots, leachers, lurkers, trolls and a few other types of users.

Our goal was to build something like https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guess_Who%3F with IRC archetypes. We wanted to have the room expand and contract as people shared files (or viruses!) and toxic users spewed their messages into the room.

Your goal is to build a community that is happily downloading warez by kicking people who are toxic and promoting people who contribute positively. By controlling the room you can hopefully get your download rate up faster.
